front.title: Advertising Per-node Admin Tags in BGP Link-State Advertisements

abstract.t: This document describes the protocol extensions to collect per-node administrative tags adevertised in IGP Link State advertisements and disseminate the same in BGP Link-State advertisement protocol, to facilitate inter-AS TE applications that may need the same per-node administrative tags to associate a subset of network devices spanning across more than one AS with a specific functionality.
